vendor_name: Senses Noosa North Shore (formally Beach Road Holiday Homes Noosa)
title: Architect-Designed Noosa Escape for up to Eight Guests
description:
Australia’s sunshine playground of wildlife, ancient trees towering over coastal landscape and some of the best swells in Queensland beckons with a stay at Beach Road Holiday Homes Noosa. Whether you’re whisking the whole family away for some rest and relaxation in a coastal setting just 1.5km from the beach or you’re taking a break with friends, this architect-designed, eco-inspired escape lets you relax your way in utmost privacy. Your stay includes four nights in a Three-Bedroom House for six guests with two bottles of wine on arrival and a 12pm late checkout (subject to availability).

**Travelling with a large group?** Upgrade to a Four-Bedroom House package for eight people (two additional guests may stay for a surcharge, see Fine Print).

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
location_description: Beach Road Holiday Homes Noosa April 2020
offer_address: 90 Beach Rd, Noosa North Shore QLD 4565

title: Boutique Suite Stay near Hastings Street & Noosa Main Beach
description:
Discover the laidback beauty of Queensland at Noosa Blue Resort, within walking distance of the iconic Noosa Main Beach. Offering modern suites, penthouses and first-class facilities, this stylish resort will woo you with its proximity to Laguna Bay, Noosa Junction and Hastings Street - a mecca of world-class restaurants and boutique shopping.

Stay in a tranquil suite and cheers to your sun-kissed escape with a welcome bottle of bubbles on arrival. Includes a one-time 25% discount on food and drinks at Miss Moneypenny’s Noosa (maximum A$50 discount), 50% off an all-day ferry pass with Noosa Ferry & Cruise Company, complimentary parking, Wi-Fi and Foxtel throughout your stay, and more.

title: Relaxed Sunshine Coast Two- & Three-Bedroom Self-Contained Townhouses near Noosa River with Three Pools
description: Discover the laidback charm of the Sunshine Coast in a relaxing home-away-from-home, a stone's throw from the tranquil waters of the Noosa River and a short drive from Noosa Main Beach. With your self-contained two- or three-bedroom townhouse as your impeccable base, head into Noosa and plunge into the rolling waves on a boogie board or stroll along popular Hastings Street where top restaurants, high-end boutiques and more gorgeous greenery awaits, or wander nearby Hilton Terrace after busy days exploring the wonders of the region, retreat to your accommodation, take a refreshing dip in the impressive lagoon pool or enjoy a friendly tennis match at the onsite courts. When it's time to refuel, head to the alfresco PK's Cafe and Bar or cook up a storm at one of the onsite barbecue areas.

title: Stylish Apartment Escape for up to Four People in Sunny Noosa
description:
Treat yourself to a relaxing escape in one of Australia’s most loved destinations with a stay at Bella Casa Noosa Resort - a modern oasis nestled right on Hastings Street, steps from Noosa Heads Main Beach. Stay in a beautifully designed, self-contained apartment and enjoy a bottle of wine on arrival, 25% discount on food and drinks at Miss Moneypenny's, complimentary Wi-Fi, Foxtel and undercover car parking, a complimentary one-way ferry ticket to the local Noosa Boathouse restaurant and a leisurely late 12pm checkout.

**Travelling with a group?** Check out the Two-Bedroom Apartment upgrade, valid for up to four people.

title: Noosaville One- & Two-Bedroom Apartments near Gympie Terrace with Outdoor Pool and Parking
description:
Surrender to the laidback lifestyle of the Sunshine Coast with a stay at this tranquil Noosaville haven. Set among lush, landscaped gardens, this self-contained oasis places you within easy reach of the region's best attractions - from sparkling waterways and golden beaches to lush national parks.

Make use of your apartment's fully equipped kitchen or take a short stroll to Gympie Terrace, where waterfront restaurants, outdoor bars and stylish boutiques await. Set along the tranquil Noosa River, this bustling riverside promenade is one of the region's best-kept secrets. A short 10-minute drive brings you to the vibrant Hastings Street, home to boutiques and restaurants overlooking Noosa Main Beach.

Return to the resort for a dip in the outdoor pool or soak up the tropical sunshine from a lounger in the lush garden. Named after the Spanish word for summer, Verano delivers that endless holiday feeling all year round.

title: Award-Winning Noosa Apartment-Style Stay with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Daily A$75 Resort Credit
description:
Find serenity on the Sunshine Coast and embrace the laid-back lifestyle of Noosa at this modern, award-winning resort. Surrounded by lush bushland, this is the perfect private escape mere moments from Noosa's best - with spacious apartments offering the ideal space to stretch out after a day of exploration.

Begin your day with a bountiful breakfast at Arcuri, sip on a refreshing drink at Dazza’s Bar or indulge in a signature treatment at One Spa, where relaxation is redefined. For families, the splash park, water slides and games room keep everyone entertained, while the lagoon pool and infinity-edge heated pool are ideal for a touch of zen.

Whether you're enjoying a casual meal by the pool, taking the complimentary shuttle to Hastings Street or perfecting your backhand on the tennis court, every moment feels like a personalised slice of paradise.
offer_address: 94 Noosa Drive, Noosa Heads, Queensland 4567, Australia

title: Relaxing Apartment Escape on Noosa's Vibrant Hastings Street
description:
Embrace the laid-back lifestyle of one of Australia’s favourite escape destinations staying at Ocean Breeze Resort - ideally located on Noosa’s vibrant Hastings Street. Relax in one of the resort's apartments and enjoy an acai bowl per adult at Acai Brothers Noosa Heads, a bottle of sparkling wine on arrival, complimentary one-way ferry to the local restaurant Noosa Boathouse and complimentary beach pack hire with towels and toys.

You will also receive a 10% discount on food when dining at Café Le Monde or El Capitano, complimentary undercover parking, free Wi-Fi, and a guaranteed, leisurely late 12pm checkout.

title: Award-Winning Noosa Eco-Glamping Escape with Lake Cruise & Nightly Drinks
description:
When you want to get off the grid and back to nature, treat your loved ones to a stay at Habitat Noosa Ecocamp, an award-winning wilderness eco-camp only 25 minutes north of Noosa. Nestled on 65 acres of bushland in the Great Sandy National Park and perched on the edge of Lake Cootharaba, you have plenty of room to roam here. Just take it from the dozens of eastern grey kangaroos you’ll see hopping around the expansive grounds - some of which call Habitat Noosa home.

Awarded Australia’s Best New Tourism Business at the Qantas Australian Tourism Awards in 2020, this campground leads the way in Queensland’s eco-tourism sector with a focus on protecting the environment, while still providing exceptional amenities. Recent restorations have resulted in a sparkling new camp kitchen and glamping tents that are fully equipped with everything you could possibly need. Feeling peckish after a day exploring? The CootharaBAR & Bistro serves some of the freshest local produce for mouthwatering lunches and dinners, while the onsite microbrewery is the perfect place to enjoy an artisanal beer while relaxing to the soundtrack of the park.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Enjoy an afternoon cruise for two to the Everglades, complete with a glass of bubbly each and a delicious tasting plate
- Up to two children (16 and under) stay free with 50% off Habitat Noosa Ecocamp Tours
- Kick back after a day of exploring with a refreshing nightly drink each at CootharaBAR
- Set out on epic adventures with 50% off any additional adult tours run by the property

**Cruise Upgrades:** Enhance your wilderness experience when you upgrade to a full-day Eco Cruise or Cruise 'n' Canoe package, which will see you discover the tranquil beauty of the Australian Everglades. Both experiences include morning tea and a chef-prepared lunch, as well as unforgettable sightseeing. See the Fine Print for information.
offer_address: 204 Lake Flat Road, Boreen Point, Queensland 4565, Australia

title: Barefoot Beachfront Luxury with Massages & Gourmet Inclusions Steps Away from the Iconic Hastings Street
description: Embrace the laid-back lifestyle of one of Australia’s most loved holiday destinations staying at the award-winning Netanya Noosa Resort, located close to the boutiques, restaurants and coffee shops of Hastings Street. Treat yourself to a sun-kissed getaway in one of Noosa’s only beachfront resorts and enjoy a complimentary bottle of sparkling, a gourmet cheese box and two $30 credit for massages and treatments at the resort’s blissful Fuss Day Spa.

title: Peppers Noosa Indulgence with Daily Breakfast & Celebrity Chef Lunch
description:
You don't need to travel far to reach a tropical paradise. Just a 30-minute drive from Sunshine Coast Airport, Peppers Noosa Resort & Villas offers a quiet rainforest retreat with not one, but two lagoon pools, all just minutes from the attractions of Hastings Street. Enjoy a relaxing stay with a complimentary upgrade from a Studio Room to a One-Bedroom Apartment, plus daily buffet breakfast, one lunch at View by celebrity chef Matt Golinski, a bottle of sparkling wine on arrival, A$50 poolside food and drink credit, half-day electric bike hire, A$20 voucher per person to use at the award-winning onsite spa, one beach bag per stay and a guaranteed 12pm late checkout.

**Travelling with family or friends?** Upgrade to a Two-Bedroom Apartment for up to four people.

title: Relaxed Boutique Apartment Escape in the Heart of Noosa
description:
The cool and relaxed vibes of one of Australia’s most iconic holiday destinations await: discover all that Noosa has to offer staying at The Rise Noosa, a hillside retreat surrounded by tropical gardens and perfectly positioned just a short walk from bustling Hastings Street.

Live like a local in a fully self-contained apartment or a spacious townhouse and enjoy a bottle of sparkling wine on arrival, a guaranteed 2pm late check-out and an exclusive Experience Passport with savings on local experiences and dining and drinks at some of Noosa's most celebrated restaurants.

vendor_name: Senses Noosa North Shore (formally Beach Road Holiday Homes Noosa)
title: Architect-Designed Eco-Inspired Seclusion within Noosa Biosphere Reserve for up to Six Guests
description:
Australia’s sunshine playground of wildlife, towering ancient trees, coastal landscapes and some of the best swells in Queensland beckons with a stay at Beach Road Holiday Homes Noosa. Whether you’re whisking the whole family away for some rest in a coastal setting or taking a break with friends, this architect-designed, eco-inspired escape lets you relax your way in utmost privacy. Hidden within a gated community on Noosa's North Shore and surrounded by 68,000 hectares of World Heritage-listed national park, these private homes are your haven for relaxation and adventure.

Enjoy sun-kissed afternoons in the estate's shared swimming pool, chase 4WD action in the Great Sandy National Park or embark on a day trip to magnificent Fraser Island, an enigmatic paradise carved by wind, water and sand. No matter your holiday style, this luxurious retreat offers tranquil seclusion, a coastal ambience and plenty of space to spend time with your nearest and dearest while connecting with nature. If you’ve come for the surf, you’re in the right place. You're staying within the Noosa Biosphere Reserve, a UNESCO-recognised area famous for its highly diverse ecosystem, featuring a string of breaks for surfing, kayaking and canoeing.
offer_address: 90 Beach Road, Noosa North Shore, Queensland 4565, Australia

title: Relax and Recharge on a Stunning Noosa Beach Getaway
description: Escape to dazzling Noosa Beach on the Sunshine Coast. Unwind with a four-day/three-night stay in a one-bedroom Hastings Apartment at the award-winning Netanya Noosa Resort. Enjoy a bottle of sparkling wine on arrival, relaxing spa credits, fantastic savings on local activities and more. Only $849 for two adults, valued up to $1,196.

vendor_name: Senses Noosa North Shore (formally Beach Road Holiday Homes Noosa)
title: Noosa North Shore Three- & Four-Bedroom Holiday Homes with Car Ferry Pass & Three Outdoor Pools
description:
Queensland's sun-kissed playground of wildlife, towering ancient trees and coastal landscapes beckons at this luxe retreat. Whether you’re whisking the whole family away for some new memories by the beach or taking a break with friends, this collection of architect-designed, eco-inspired homes lets you relax in utmost privacy.

Senses Noosa North Shore offers a balance of privacy and proximity, nestled within 40 acres of native bushland. Each well-appointed home is a spacious sanctuary, blending indoor and outdoor living with high ceilings, expansive living areas and private carports for the ultimate convenience.

There's plenty of complimentary family fun to enjoy, including soccer nets and cornhole on the Village Green. Lounge by one of three pools while the kids splash around in the wading pool, or practice your serve at the onsite tennis court. For those looking for adventure, Noosa’s scenic beaches and bush trails are just a short stroll from your door.
offer_address: 90 Beach Road, Noosa North Shore, Queensland 4565, Australia

title: Peaceful Lakeside Escape in Noosa, QLD
description: Head to a place where the sun always shines with a lakeside getaway at the Metzo Noosa Resort. Situated in the heart of Queensland’s Sunshine Coast, you can expect beautiful temperate weather all year round, as well as stunning lake views and an abundance of activities including fishing, boating and surfing. Whether it’s a couple’s retreat or a family getaway, comfortable self-contained apartments, a bottle of wine on arrival and a guaranteed late midday check-out promise a relaxing break.

title: The World’s Only Veuve Clicquot Boutique Hotel with All-Inclusive Dining, Champagne & Celebrated Guest Chef Dinners
description:
Immerse yourself in Veuve Clicquot’s sun-loving ‘solaire’ lifestyle at the world's only Hotel Clicquot Noosa, exclusive to Luxury Escapes. A visually striking boutique property with uninterrupted views of the ocean and private access to glorious Sunshine Beach and Noosa National Park, Hotel Clicquot dazzles all the senses. From the instantly recognisable yellow-and-white-striped beach umbrellas lining the aquamarine swimming pool to the bursts of iconic Clicquot Yellow against the neutral colour palette of the interiors, the Solaire personality shines through at every turn.

During your once-in-a-lifetime, two-night experience, enjoy complimentary champagne and all-inclusive dining prepared by your private chefs, including two chef's table experiences with renowned-Australian chefs. Enjoy that joyful Veuve Clicquot touch with a 24-hour private concierge and a resident sommelier, take a chauffeured ride into town to explore the boutiques of this fashionable resort town and sip Veuve Clicquot by the pool as the sun sets. Do as little or as much as you like during your stay, but rest assured you’ll be caught up in the joyful atmosphere of this singular luxury experience.

title: Boutique Townhouse Stay in Noosa
description: Discover why Noosa is one of Australia’s favourite holiday destinations with three or five nights in a spacious townhouse at The Rise Noosa. You'll have the best of the region right on your doorstep with the famous Noosa main beach, trendy Hastings St, popular Noosa Junction and Noosa National Park within easy walking distance. Plus, enjoy a bottle of wine on arrival and a late midday checkout.

title: Stylish Apartments on Noosa's Hastings St
description: Escape to one of Australia’s favourite holiday destinations with a three-night getaway to Bella Casa Noosa Resort. Stay in a fully self-contained apartment located right on Hastings St and across the road from Noosa Main Beach. Plus receive a complimentary bottle of wine, late checkout, complimentary Wi-Fi, secure parking, discounted dining and Foxtel for two.

title: Noosa Eco-Glamping Retreat Among 65 Acres of Bushland with Camp Credit
description: When you want to get off the grid and back to nature, treat your loved ones with a stay at Habitat Noosa Everglades Eco Camp. A wilderness escape set amongst 65 acres of national park and perched on the edge of picturesque Lake Cootharaba. This eco camp leads the way in Queensland’s eco tourism sector with a focus on protecting the environment, while spoiling guests with exceptional amenities. Enjoy a bottle of sparkling wine on arrival while you settle into your Paperbark Glamping Tent, equipped with some of the comforts of home. Feeling peckish after a day exploring? The CootharaBAR & Bistro menu showcase fresh, local produce, or why not try an artesian beer in the onsite brewery, with stunning lakeside views. With a number of water activities, walking treks and daily tours to Australia’s only Everglades, Habitat Noosa Everglades Eco Camp is a must see!
offer_address: 204 Lake Flat Road, Boreen Point, Queensland 4565, Australia

title: Sunshine Coast Self-Contained Noosa Apartments for up to Four Guests
description:
Escape to the Sunshine Coast with a stay at Sunset Cove Noosa Resort, where self-contained apartments and top-notch facilities make for the ultimate sun-kissed hideaway. On days you want to stay close to the resort, enjoy a paddle in the heated, lagoon-style swimming pool, read that book you’ve been meaning to finish while reclining on a sun lounger, relax with a steam in the sauna or cook up a big BBQ dinner to enjoy under the stars.

When you’re ready to venture outside, Noosa's wonders await with open arms. Spend balmy, fun-filled days lazing on the sand at the postcard-perfect Noosa Main Beach. If you’re feeling peckish, there's an array of delicious dining options and cafés to choose from along the riverfront, including Noosa Boathouse. Before you leave, pick up a unique handcrafted artwork at Eumundi Markets (open Wednesdays and Saturdays).

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Enhance your stay with a complimentary upgrade to a Two-Bedroom Superior Apartment
- Toast your escape with a welcome bottle of wine waiting in your apartment on arrival
- Stay connected thanks to complimentary in-room high-speed Wi-Fi

**Travelling with family?** Upgrade to a Three-Bedroom Superior Apartment for up to six guests.

title: Award-Winning Beachfront Resort in Noosa
description: Discover why Noosa Beach is one of Australia's favourite holiday destinations with four days/three nights at the award-winning Netanya Noosa Resort, one of Noosa's only beachfront resorts. Stay in a fully self contained apartment and unwind with a complimentary bottle of sparkling wine, cheese box and relaxing spa vouchers for two.

title: Noosa Beachfront Bliss with Indulgent Wine, Cheese & Spa Inclusions
description: Listen to the waves lap the sun-drenched shores of Main Beach at one of the most desirable hotels in Noosa - Netanya.  Boasting a prime beachfront location in the heart of Noosa Heads, these stylish serviced apartments are perfect for those seeking a touch of serenity on the Sunshine Coast. Located within walking distance of world-class restaurants, boutique shops and Noosa’s stunning national park - you'll be spoilt for choice with things to see and do in this beautiful corner of Queensland. And with added extras including a bottle of Prosecco, cheese hamper and A$60 worth of spa vouchers as part of your package, your stay at Netanya Noosa will be one to remember.

title: Five-Star Noosa Apartment Escape
description:
Embrace Queensland's laidback lifestyle from the five-star RACV Noosa Resort - stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice award 2021. Nestled in verdant Australian hinterland, just a 30-minute drive from Sunshine Coast Airport and a stone's throw from pristine beaches and Hastings Street, RACV Noosa Resort offers the best of both worlds: a secluded oasis to retreat to whenever you like, yet just minutes from all Noosa has to offer.

With a variety of stylish apartments, relaxed poolside dining and family-friendly facilities - including a swimming pool with two heated waterslides, a splash park and floodlit tennis court - RACV Noosa Resort affords just the right level of self-contained privacy and resort comforts. When you're not enjoying the facilities or the convenience of your apartment, Noosa's legendary attractions are yours to discover. Immerse yourself in the heart of bustling Hastings Street or find inner calm with pristine rainforests, rolling hills and quaint hinterland villages.

title: Sun-Kissed Self-contained Noosa Resort
description:
Seek a sun-kissed escape at Noosa Blue Resort, a relaxing retreat conveniently located within walking distance of Hastings Street, Main Beach, Noosa National Park, and Noosa Junction.

Casual, cool, and colourful, this boutique resort was designed with comfort in front of mind, and inspired by Mexico’s most revered architect, Ricardo Legorreta, and his philosophies of Earth and sky.

Providing the perfect getaway for couples, groups, and families, these self-contained apartments feature individual in-room spas, large furnished balconies with daybed, shutters for privacy and a kitchenette with quality appliances. To add to that tranquil beach lifestyle, the resort also boasts two outdoor swimming pools, heated spa, kids pool, a casual restaurant and a yoga pilates studio.

**Exclusive extras:**

- A bottle of wine on arrival
- Complimentary Wi-Fi, Foxtel and undercover car parking during your stay
- 25% discount on food and drinks at Miss Moneypenny's
- Discount on coffee at Noosa Social Espresso & Wine Bar
- Leisurely late 11am checkout

title: Noosa Beachfront Apartment Escape
description:
Sink into the oceanfront pool of the luxe Seahaven Noosa and enjoy direct access to Noosa Main Beach from this sleek apartment resort. Located on acclaimed Hastings Street, home to Noosa’s renowned foodie and boutique shopping scene, Seahaven Noosa is your gateway to tranquil national park walks, coastal exploration and days spent lounging on the beachfront.

Use this self-contained oasis as your launchpad to discover the Noosa Everglades and the renowned Sunshine Coast.

title: Relaxing Noosa Apartment Escape
description:
Follow the sunshine to the gorgeous Macquarie Lodge Apartments in Noosa Heads, a short stroll from Main Beach and the upscale boutiques and eateries of Hastings Street.

Featuring a collection of sun-drenched, fully equipped apartments with glorious private balconies and tropical vistas, you're sure to feel at home in this family-friendly paradise. Enjoy the palm-fringed heated pool year-round, unwind in the outdoor spa, or gather your family and friends for a BBQ in the communal entertainment area. Wander along the boardwalk to the private beach along the banks of Noosa River, connect with nature on a stroll through the resort's gardens or ask the friendly tour desk to help plan your next adventure - from windsurfing to rock climbing, fishing charters, scuba diving and more.

title: Apartment Retreat in the Heart of Noosa
description:
Live like a local at The Rise Noosa, a hillside retreat surrounded by tropical gardens and perfectly positioned just a short walk from Noosa Main Beach.

The ideal place for couples, groups, and families looking for that relaxed beach lifestyle, these beautifully designed, self-contained apartments and townhouses put the best of one of Australia’s most iconic destinations at your fingertips. Unwind on the golden shores of Noosa Main Beach, discover something different, handmade or uniquely Australian at the Original Eumundi Markets or indulge in the culinary temptations of Hastings Street, just a short 400m walk away.

title: Stylish Noosa Apartment Escape on Hastings Street
description: Discover the magic of the Sunshine Coast with a stay at Jacaranda Noosa Apartments, perfectly positioned in its most iconic shopping precinct and offering unrivalled access to the region's spectacular surf beaches, charming coastal towns and sprawling wilderness. Between moments spent by the resort’s outdoor pool, wave to the dolphins at Noosa National Park or savour sunset cocktails and Laguna Bay views on Hastings Street, surrounded by fairy lights.
offer_address: 12 Hastings Street, Noosa Heads, Queensland 4567, Australia

title: Chic Noosa Escape on Hastings Street with Outdoor Pool, Spa & Onsite Dining
description:
Nestled in the heart of Noosa on iconic Hastings Street, this luxurious stay offers a blend of coastal charm and sophisticated elegance. Sofitel Noosa Pacific Resort invites you to unwind with a meal at Noosa Beach House Restaurant, sip a spritz at the Riviera Bar & Lounge while watching the sunset over the Noosa River, or relax by the lagoon-style pool with a swim-up bar.

Venture out to explore boutiques and local eateries along Hastings Street, or take a leisurely river cruise. For food lovers, the Noosa Farmers Market is a must-visit, offering fresh local produce and artisanal treats. This resort is the perfect base to experience the natural beauty and vibrant lifestyle of one of Australia’s most sought-after beach destinations.
offer_address: 14-16 Hastings Street, Noosa Heads, Queensland 4567, Australia
